/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and green accents that add a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a sense of order and symmetry to the scene. Despite the absence of people or moving vehicles, the image conveys a sense of life and activity, as if frozen in a moment of time.
